thread.title: Narendra Modi always thinks about how to alleviate pain of poor:Union Minister Harsh Vardhan
thread.title_full: Narendra Modi always thinks about how to alleviate pain of poor:Union Minister Harsh Vardhan

author: Wires English | Press Trust of India
title: Narendra Modi always thinks about how to alleviate pain of poor:Union Minister Harsh Vardhan
text:
Comments 
Hyderabad, Oct 11: Union Minister Harsh Vardhan today said the Prime Minister Narendra Modi always thinks about the welfare of poor people and tries to mitigate their pain through various government schemes. (Read: Glimpses of India painting contest begins tomorrow in Egypt) 
“Our Prime Minister Narendra Modi thinks only about the welfare of poor people and his focus is also poor only. The entral government’s several schemes reflect it,” Harsh Vardhan said while addressing a ‘Jan Chetana Sabha’ public meeting of the BJP party here this evening.”I am in his cabinet and I can say this with pride that out of the 24 hours, the PM only thinks about how to take the country forward and he only thinks on how to alleviate the sorrow and problems of the poor through various schemes,” the Union Science and Technology Minister said. 
Government is doing work seriously and Narendra Modi wants to make this country ‘vishwa guru’ (world leader), the BJP leader said. He said that BJP-led NDA will emerge victorious in Bihar polls and further expressed confidence that the saffron party will win the forthcoming GHMC elections in Hyderabad and will have its Mayor
